comment: Super helpful in making sure you understand the material and is willing to work with you to provide feedback on your assignments. This is a good class to have group work in, you will have a few group projects but it super fun and helpful for education majors. I would definitely take her every chance I got!

Prof, is an amazing person and is the definition of a great professor. She is what every teacher should strive to be. She is so passionate about history education and it really shows through. There are a lot of assignments but they're easy and very beneficial. If you walk out of her class not like her you need to rethink your career goals.
